  • Method Details

    • register

      GymOwner register(GymOwner gymOwner)
      Registers a new GymOwner.
      Returns:
      the registered GymOwner

    • gymOwnerLogin

      boolean gymOwnerLogin(String userName, String password)
      Logs in a GymOwner by checking the provided username and password against the GymOwnerDAOImpl.
      Parameters:
      userName - the username of the GymOwner
      password - the password of the GymOwner
      Returns:
      true if the login is successful, false otherwise

    • gymOwnerChangePassword

      void gymOwnerChangePassword(String userName, String old_password, String new_password)
      Changes the password of a gym owner.
      Parameters:
      userName - the username of the gym owner
      old_password - the current password of the gym owner
      new_password - the new password to be set

    • viewAllGymOwners

      void viewAllGymOwners()
      Retrieves and displays information about all gym owners in a tabular format.

    • getGymOwnerId

      String getGymOwnerId(String userName, String password)
      Retrieves the Gym Owner ID based on the provided username and password.
      Parameters:
      userName - the username of the Gym Owner
      password - the password of the Gym Owner
      Returns:
      the Gym Owner ID

    • requestGymOwnerApproval

      void requestGymOwnerApproval(String gymOwnerId)
      Sends a request for approval of a gym owner.
      Parameters:
      gymOwnerId - the ID of the gym owner to request approval for
